CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 24, 1958, pg. 14 reads: "Infant Baptism - Little Kirk Tyrone Black has the signal honor of being baptized during the 109th anniversary celebration of Avery AME Zion Church. As the pastor, the Rev. T.E. Brannon, performs the ceremony, Mrs. Eva Garnett, the god-mother, gives the responses, and Mrs. Ollie Webster, a stewardess, assists the minister. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Kirk Tyrone Black being baptized by Rev. T. E. Brannon while Eva Garnett, god-mother, and Ollie Webster look on, during 109th anniversary celebration of Avery AME Zion Church, another pose
